boat.construction_details: GRP, mould taken from Alf Last design. Fitted out in wood with galvanised centreboard.
boat.full_description: Switha is believed to be a Brian Kennel moulded bare hull, fitted out by Andrew Moore at Felixstowe Ferry Boat yard along with 3 other Smack boats in 2006. Her form is that of an standard, unmodified, Kennel Smack boat.
boat.name: Switha
